# 1 Regional Insights

## 1.1 Multicountries

![](images/1.1.png){fig-align="center"}

Choose the view of comparison between multicountries or single countries.

![](images/1.png)

Check the wanted countries and choose a period (the period should more than one month), then click on 'Confirm'.

## 1.2 Single Country

![](images/2.png)

Choose a single contry and choose a period (the period should more than two years), then click on 'Confirm'.

# 2 Geographic Visual 

![](images/3.png)

Choose a exact data and click on 'Confirm', the distribution of electricity prices will be represented by different colors in the map of Europe.

# 3 Forecasting

![](images/4.png)

Checking the box to choose a preferred forecasting method, select the interesting future period and country, then click on"Generate Forecasting Plot".
